snippet.title: ASHEN | Nightstorm Isle DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Available September 6 on the Epic Games Store and Xbox One. https://www.ashen-game.com/

Epic: http://bit.ly/AshenDLCEpic
Xbox: http://bit.ly/AshenDLCXbox

The wanderer accompanies a mother on a quest to find her lost daughter. Venturing far from familiar ash covered shores, players descend into the perilous depths of Nightstorm Isle. Countless horrors lurk below, yet nothing will prepare you for the ancient evil they imprison.

Developed by A44. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2019
